node.title: When Life Doesn't Go Your Way
node.description: Do you feel like God isn't listening? Like life just doesn't go your way? The Millerite moment surely felt that way when Jesus didn't come on October 22, 1844. A day we now refer to as the "Great Disappointment". Pastor Chris Holland gleams at the past disappointment of William Miller and shares how to put your trust in the Word of God even when things seem hopeless and lost.
